post:
# Promo


Mini (Ashburn, VA)

```
- CPU: 1 vCore
- RAM: 1 GB 
- Storage: 10 GiB SSD
- Bandwidth: 10Gbps
- Traffic: 1 TiB (In + Out)
- IPv4 1 x /32
- IPv6 1 x /64 (Manual configuration required)
- $70 / yr
```

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=53&billingcycle=annually&promocode=XMAS2018)

Nano (Khabarvosk, RU)

```
- CPU: 1 vCore
- RAM: 512 MiB
- Storage: 10 GiB SSD
- Bandwidth: 1Gbps
- Traffic: 320 GiB (Out)
- IPv4 1 x /32
- IPv6 1 x /64 (Manual configuration required)
- $42 / yr or $6 / mo
```

[Purchase (Monthly)](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=56&billingcycle=monthly)
[Purchase (Annually)](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=56&billingcycle=annually&promocode=XMAS2018)


Mini (Khabarovsk, RU)

```
- CPU: 1 vCore
- RAM: 1 GiB 
- Storage: 16 GiB SSD
- Bandwidth: 10Gbps
- Traffic: 640 GiB (Out)
- IPv4 1 x /32
- IPv6 1 x /64 (Manual configuration required)
- $84 / yr
```

[Purchase (Annually)](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=54&billingcycle=annually&promocode=XMAS2018)

Higher plans can be found on our [website](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?gid=3).

The promo `XMAS2018` is valid for annual products in Ashburn and Khabarovsk datacenter.

We can also provide BGP session and IP announcement service. NRC is 15 USD Per Account and can be waived if you have active annually products.

# Datacenter and network

## Khabarovsk

Datacenter: Redcom Khabarovsk (G-Core)

Transit: Rostelecom, TTK, MegaFon, MTS

Test IPv4: 185.209.84.233

Test IPv6: 2a0b:4342:4000:233::

Looking Glass: http://ru-khv01.lg.zeptovm.com/

## Ashburn, VA

Datacenter: Equinix DC2 (Voxility)

Transit: NTT, Telia, TI Sparkle

Test IPv4: 199.119.65.5

Test IPv6: 2a0b:4342:3000:233::

Looking Glass: http://us-iad01.lg.zeptovm.com/

# About us

Misaka Network, Inc. is a Delaware registered corporation.

We are RIPE NCC LIR member and also run our own network AS57695 / AS57578 / AS50069.
